p: AAPH (2, 2′ azobist (2-amidino-propane) dihydrochloride) (0.645 g) was completely dissolved in 10 mL of 75 mM phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) and was kept in ice bath. Fluorescein stock solution (1 mM) was prepared with 0.016 g dissolved in 50 mL of 75 mM phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) was kept at 4 °C in dark condition. Trolox (6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetra methylchroman-2-carboxylic acid) standard was prepared and the stock solution of Trolox was diluted with phosphate buffer to 100 µM, 50 µM, 25 µM, 12.5 µM, 6.25 µM, 3.125 µM, 1.5625 µM, and 0 µM working solution.
